articles.description: Findings on ‘metabolic risk factors’ reflect shift in biggest threats since start of 21st century
articles.content: The number of people becoming seriously ill or dying prematurely from conditions such as high blood pressure and obesity has risen 50 per cent since 2000, underlining the huge challenge diseases link… [+3407 chars]

articles.author: Beth Mole, Ars Technica
articles.title: Wegovy Can Keep Weight Off for at Least 4 Years, Research Shows - WIRED
articles.description: Users receiving weekly injections saw their weight fall, plateau, and stabilize over the course of a four-year trial—but it’s still unclear how long these effects last after stopping taking the drug.
articles.content: A large, long-term trial of the weight-loss medication Wegovy (semaglutide) found that people tended to lose weight over the first 65 weeks on the drugabout one year and three monthsbut then hit a pl… [+3523 chars]

articles.title: Google's Project Gameface can now work with Android - 9to5Google
articles.description: Google has managed to bring Project Gameface, a collection of accessibility gestures, to Android after debuting on Windows in 2023.
articles.content: Accessibility is an ongoing effort with any and all digital products. At I/O 2024, Google has announced that Project Gameface will be added to Android to allow for users to control their device with … [+1212 chars]
